https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/orht5Ukr1LsJKa33miyT9v5yKJ0.jpg DOOMSDAY MACHINE (Mashine Rooze Ghiamat) deals with the mentally disabled war veterans in one of the permanent sanatoriums in Tehran. One of the patients "Mahmood" is under the illusion that he has built a "doomsday machine" which can destroy the world by pressing a button. Doomsday Machine
